column1: Smoque BBQ////Interestingly the owner hovers near the place where you order
column2: and turns out to be there to help you enjoy the food.  When asked what is the best thing on the menu
column3: he recommended the sliced brisket (I had had the pulled pork at the recommendation of a friend
column5: but more of a foil for the sauces).  He asked what sort of 'heat' we liked
column6: and then came over with a variety of sauces to try (I guess you have to know about the additional sauces and ask...??).   Anyway I loved them all
column9: so I guess I have to go back this week.  Outstanding BBQ and service.
